name: embl_ebi_mcp
description: Unified MCP server exposing EMBL-EBI Search, Summary (S4), and UniProt Protein APIs, including global and domain search, entry retrieval, cross-references, biological summaries, protein identity, features, proteomics, proteomes, taxonomy, coordinates, UniParc, and accession annotations.

tools.name: search_all
tools.description: Search across all EMBL-EBI indexed domains.

tools.name: search_domain
tools.description: Search within a specific EMBL-EBI domain (e.g. UniProt, Ensembl, Literature).

tools.name: search_get_entry
tools.description: Retrieve full metadata for one or more entries from a domain.

tools.name: search_xref_targeted
tools.description: Retrieve cross-references from a source entry to a specific target domain.

tools.name: search_xref_all
tools.description: Retrieve all cross-references for a given entry across all linked domains.

tools.name: search_xref_domain
tools.description: Discover which domains are cross-referenced by a given source domain.

tools.name: search_more_like_this_same_domain
tools.description: Find biologically similar entries within the same domain.

tools.name: search_more_like_this_cross_domain
tools.description: Find biologically related entries in a different target domain.

tools.name: search_summary_suggestions
tools.description: Get suggested biological summary terms using the EBI Summary (S4) API.

tools.name: search_summary_identification
tools.description: Resolve and identify mixed or ambiguous biological identifiers.

tools.name: search_summary_multireference
tools.description: Summarize biological entities across multiple references.

tools.name: search_summary_details
tools.description: Retrieve detailed biological summaries for a given entity.

tools.name: protein_identity
tools.description: Retrieve UniProt protein identity and core metadata by accession.

tools.name: protein_features
tools.description: Retrieve curated UniProt protein features such as domains, regions, and sites.

tools.name: protein_proteomics
tools.description: Retrieve peptide-level proteomics evidence including PTM, non-PTM, and HPP data.

tools.name: protein_proteomes
tools.description: Retrieve proteome-level metadata and organism coverage from UniProt.

tools.name: protein_taxonomy
tools.description: Retrieve taxonomy information associated with UniProt protein entries.

tools.name: protein_coordinates
tools.description: Retrieve genomic coordinate mappings for UniProt protein accessions.

tools.name: protein_uniparc
tools.description: Access UniParc non-redundant protein sequence archive and sequence identity mappings.

tools.name: protein_accession_annotations
tools.description: Retrieve accession-level annotations linked to UniProt protein records.
